title: Multimedia Utilization Strategy Design for Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary scientific theories and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A customized science education course for professionals. Emphasizes self-directed and collaborative learning in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific concepts with 80% or higher accuracy using various multimedia tools (infographics, simulations, videos)
Learners produce and share learning materials reflecting peer feedback on LMS discussion boards at least twice
Learners analyze formative assessment results to develop personalized learning plans and revise/improve them at least three times
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
